main event: On 20 October 1962, multiple objects were observed over Bristol, Rhode Island, including one bright light that moved across the sky and exhibited unusual characteristics.
interesting points: The witness was a reliable and respected individual who observed the object for approximately 20 minutes., The object was reported to have stopped, hovered, made a sharp turn, and then disappeared at a high speed., Samples collected from the area were identified as materials commonly used in local industries, including polystyrene and polyethylene., The sighting involved a watch officer at the Rhode Island Air National Guard Headquarters who reported the observation to ATIC., There was no evidence of any hoax related to the recovered materials.
